attributes.action: Organise a referendum on whether to ask Paris if they're prepared to take the 2012 Olympics off our hands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Tessa Jowell, the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport, dismissed criticism of the spiralling costs of the 2012 London Olympics as 'Votes for Paris',  it might be instructive to have a UK-wide referendum to see if we're still interested in funding the games or if, in fact, we really would rather 'vote for Paris'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
